synopsis.text:
Shizuka, a timid college student grappling with city life, steps out of her comfort zone to attend a social gathering. Here, she encounters the captivating Ryou, a fellow student who exudes an aura of a sophisticated older sister. The two quickly form a bond, leading to an impromptu sleepover at Ryou's apartment. However, the night takes an unexpected turn when Ryou makes a bold advance towards Shizuka. Initially, Shizuka assumes Ryou to be a lesbian, but the truth is far more complex - Ryou is, in fact, a man who enjoys crossdressing.

As Shizuka navigates her newfound relationship with Ryou, she finds herself drawn into a world of passion and confusion. The anime, available in various versions to cater to different audiences, promises a rollercoaster of emotions and unexpected twists. Will Shizuka be able to accept Ryou for who he truly is, or will this encounter leave her even more confused about love and relationships? Only time will tell in this intriguing tale of love, identity, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
